general.empty-data: There are no records to show
general.empty-filter-data: There are no records matching your request
general.share-description: Please share this website with your friends and relatives on social networks so that everybody in Vietnam as well as the World can join together to win the pandemic!
general.success-copy-to-share: Copy successfully, please share it widely...

gender.select-gender-to-see-more: Choose a gender to see more details about those cases.

hints.select-nation: Select nation: Click on the country on the interactive map or select through the country search box.
hints.select-date: Select time: Click on the displayed time frame to reselect the time that data is displayed on the interactive map.
hints.select-case-type: Select case type: Click on one of the 4 case overview boxes to select the type of case data to display on the interactive map
hints.other-options: Other support tools: Several other tools are also provided on the bottom right of the interactive map.
hints.approximate-data: Data is approximate: The worldwide number of cases is constantly changing, the data we provide may be different and slower than actual reports.
hints.accuracy-data: Accuracy of data: The data we provide only includes information about cases that have been publicly disclosed by the country. Some countries may not have data because they haven't published data and report publicly.
hints.differences-data: Differences of data: Data in many places may have negligible differences because there are various sources that are tracking and aggregating Covid-19 data. They may update at different times and have different ways of gathering data.
hints.vn-in-data-center: Data Center: See more information about the situation of Covid-19 in Vietnam at the Data Center (data, charts, history, ...).
hints.vn-in-map: Vietnam Map: Detailed map of all information about Covid-19 cases in Vietnam with many useful tools (search, location, details, infections, ...).
hints.world-in-data-center: Data Center: See more specific information about the situation of Covid-19 in countries around the world in the Data Center (figures, charts, history, ...).
hints.useful-features-desc: We also provide other useful features to help you capture more information about the situation of Covid-19, please take a look!

places.not-found-nation: Can't find the nation you want

center.total-cases-by-day: Total number of cases by day
center.changes-total-cases-by-day: Changes in total number of cases by day

body.cases-chart-tracking: Tracking the overview of cases with visual chart

footer.we-are-improving: We are making every effort to improve more...

news.description: Including the latest 20 news from quality news sites

timeline.description: Summary of all important information and events in different time periods

table.landscape-to-see-more: Rotate the screen horizontally to see more data in grid!

map.click-on-the-map: or click on space in the map
map.autocomplete-placeholder: Address or case number to find?

settings.click-map-to-exit-detail: Click on space in the map to exit detail-mode
settings.cover-all-relation: Auto-adjust vision to cover all related cases

errors.error-ask-refesh: New data may be updating, please try reloading the page in a few minutes.
errors.no-permission-locate: No location access on the browser, please check your settings.
errors.country-not-updated-explain: Sorry, the country you selected is not currently updated to the map, you can view more of the other countries we've provided.

terms-of-use-content:
TERMS OF USE

 

This agreement of use and privacy (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") is entered into by and between you ("you") and Vietnamcovid19.info ("Vietnamcovid19.info" or "us") regarding the use of any or all types of information on http://vietnamcovid19.info/. By using the Services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

 

The term "you" refers to all individuals and / or organizations accessing Vietnamcovid19.info for any reason.

 

I. Terms of use

 

I.1. Rights associated with the Service.

 

Vietnamcovid19.info owns and maintains all intellectual property rights to its Services but Vietnamcovid19.info does not claim to have intellectual property rights to the information posted on Vietnamcovid19.info.

 

Vietnamcovid19.info is also not responsible for the information, services and content of connected websites. You are solely responsible for the use and exploitation of this information.

 

The information on Vietnamcovid19.info is for reference only and gathered from information published by the Ministry of Health https://ncov.moh.gov.vn/, the Vietnamese government portal https: // www. facebook.com/thongtinchinhphu/, the official information page on supporting IT solutions, prevention and control of Covid-19 https://ncovi.vn/ as well as licensed press information websites in Vietnam.

 

Covid-19 information of the world is taken from WHO source https://who.sprinklr.com/, Johns Hopkins University https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/map.html and Worldometers website https: // www .worldometers.info / coronavirus /

 

Free information of community service to contribute to repelling the Covid-19 epidemic in the World and Vietnam. You should always consult the governments and Ministry of Healths information for the most up-to-date information.

 

I.2. Use and termination of use of the Service.

 

You may use the Service's content only for your own personal use (specifically not for commercial purposes) and may not copy, change, modify, create derivative works or publicly display any content of the Service. For example, you may not use the Service to sell a product or service; or use the Services to increase the number of visits to your site for commercial purposes; or use the results from the Service and then format and publicly display them, or use other tools or materials to track or copy any content from the Service. If you are unsure whether your intended use of the Service is authorized, please contact us.

 

Vietnamcovid19.info will not be responsible for disruption, downtime, loss or misrepresentation of data from attacks by other individuals or organizations, as well as for technical problems while providing Service level.

 

Vietnamcovid19.info is also not responsible for losses arising from the use of the Service or from your interaction with other users.

 

Vietnamcovid19.info reserves the right to unilaterally suspend or terminate the Service or your access to the Service.

 

II. Confidentiality agreement

 

II.1. Information we collect

 

Every time you access the Service, the Vietnamcovid19.info system will use cookies and other techniques to record your activities on Vietnamcovid19.info. The server of Vietnamcovid19.info will also automatically record information when you access this page and use the Services including but not limited to URL, IP address, browser type, language, access date and time. use the Service.

 

If you sign up to receive information regarding Covid-19, you can provide your email address or phone number on our registration form.

 

II.2. Use the information

 

We use your personal information to improve the quality of the Service, to send you notifications about new services of Vietnamcovid19.info or third party services that we believe will be helpful.

We may use your personal information in investigations, research or analysis to operate and upgrade Vietnamcovid19.info's techniques and the Services.

 

We may use your personal information to determine whether you may be interested in any third party products or services.

 

In principle, we do not provide third parties with your personal information except in the following cases:

 

●      You agree to us providing your personal information to third parties; and / or

●      We believe it is necessary to provide your personal information to third parties, for example in order to comply with legal requirements, prevent crime or protect national security, or protect fish safety. personalities of users or the public, etc .; and / or

●      A third party is the entity that acquires all or most of the legal entity that owns Vietnamcovid19.info and the Services; and / or

●      Personal information is anonymous information about visitors to Vietnamcovid19.info. We may share this type of information with third parties so they can learn about the types of visitors to Vietnamcovid19.info and how they use the Services.

 

III. Security

 

The password to access the accounts of all members of Vietnamcovid19.info is protected by Vietnamcovid19.info. However, network security is not completely secure, so Vietnamcovid19.info is not responsible for any damages that may occur.
